nodes.text: Delta-T-3 was the designation of one of the YV-865 Aurore-class freighters used by Zygerrian Slavers Guild. After Obi-Wan Kenobi, Clone captain Rex, and Governor Roshti of Kiros were captured by Zygerrian slavers, they were sent to the Kadavo slave processing facility on Kadavo by this ship.

Delta-T-3 first appeared in "Slaves of the Republic" and its designation is written in aurebesh on its wings. Additionally, other writing on the starboard hull spells "Spa", and there is further writing on the port side.
